title: Gash LCD Watch Face
summary: Syzygy Tarvos - Gash LCD Watch Face.
description: ★ Syzygy Watches ★Indicators:✔ Weather ✔ Watch battery ✔ Phone battery ✔ Phone and Watch battery Configuration:✔ Choose indicators✔ Choose color all elements✔ Choose weather unit✔ And much moreHow to use:✔ After install long press your android wear watch and choose Syzygy Tarvos More Syzygy watch faces:✔ Visit our exclusive collection on the Play Store - https://goo.gl/n1OQdy! descriptionHTML:
★ Syzygy Watches ★

Indicators:
✔ Weather
✔ Watch battery
✔ Phone battery
✔ Phone and Watch battery


Configuration:
✔ Choose indicators
✔ Choose color all elements
✔ Choose weather unit
✔ And much more

How to use:
✔ After install long press your android wear watch and choose Syzygy Tarvos

More Syzygy watch faces:
✔ Visit our exclusive collection on the Play Store - https://goo.gl/n1OQdy

! Compatible with Android Wear Device (Moto 360, LG G Watch R, SmartWatch 3, etc.)
! Works for round and squared watches.
! We DO NOT support SAMSUNG GEAR, GEAR 2 or GEAR S - Those are not Android Wear Watches.

Feedback:
✔ Send us feedback in any language at syzygywatches@gmail.com

★ Thanks for your support! ★
